name: Moviesuggest

skdetail:

Invocation Name: movie suggest
Developer Terms of Use
des: Movie Suggest app suggests a movie along with a short summary. Users can ask to suggest a movie based on the character lead, genre or category, and a rating.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
